Detailed Description

A specification of the resources defined by a particular type.

There should be one of these chunks for each resource type.

This structure is followed by an array of integers providing the set of configuration change flags (ResTable_config::CONFIG_*) that have multiple resources for that configuration. In addition, the high bit is set if that resource has been made public.

Member Data Documentation

◆ entryCount

type.ResTable_typeSpec_header.entryCount

Number of uint32_t entry configuration masks that follow.

◆ id

type.ResTable_typeSpec_header.id

The type identifier this chunk is holding.

Type IDs start at 1 (corresponding to the value of the type bits in a resource identifier). 0 is invalid.

◆ res0

type.ResTable_typeSpec_header.res0

Must be 0.

◆ res1

type.ResTable_typeSpec_header.res1

Must be 0.
